[Page Title: Home | Mysite]

top of page Pizzeria di Giovanni 40 North Market St., Charleston, SC ​ 843-727-6767 Our Story THE PASSION FOR PIZZA It all began when I was little. My mother and my beloved sister have always been my cooking inspiration. Both of them were always in the kitchen and filled my childhood with love for food. Pizza has always been traditional food in our home. We prepare it using a secret recipe, which has been passed down over generations. Fortunately, my job and passion are the same. Just working with an amazing team and cooking authentic Italian pizza with the best ingredients is the reason enough to be happy. ​ Your Giovanni See Our Menu ORDER TAKE OUT EAT HERE See Our Menu Reservations MAKE A RESERVATION Reservations Private Events FANCY A PIZZA PARTY? I'm a paragraph. Click here to add your own text and edit me. It’s easy. Just click “Edit Text” or double click me to add your own content and make changes to the font. Feel free to drag and drop me anywhere you like on your page. I’m a great place for you to tell a story and let your users know a little more about you.
